title: What is the longest game on Xbox One? - Quora

response.answer_text: Elite Dangerous works on a 1:1 scale of the Milky Way galaxy. Therefore it is said to have several billion star systems that you can visit. I understand that a lot of the game is procedurally generated but even so, it would take a player a mighty long time to play through the game and fully explore the galaxy.
I don't know what's considered the longest game. But Assasins Creed Odyssey, RDR2, and Elder Scrolls: Skyrim have some of the longest campaign/story lines ever.
